attributes.action: Ban private companies buying driving tests and selling them for a higher price
attributes.additional_details: Driving tests currently cost £62 but due to private companies buying out all the slots and then selling them on for £200+ per test it’s making it near impossible to get a test at the normal price anywhere local to where you live.
attributes.background: To make it illegal for companies to buy car and motorbike driving tests and then sell them at a higher price.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Review process for booking driving tests and ban the resale at inflated prices
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702760
